EOB Search

You have 18 Prescription Drug EOBs for the Last 90 days

Learn More About My Prescription Drug EOB keyboard_arrow_down

We will send you a Prescription Drug EOB statement for each month you buy prescription drugs. The statement can help you keep track of your monthly prescription drug costs. It includes helpful definitions, drug list updates, phone numbers to call for help and other useful information. See below for descriptions of each section of the Prescription Drug EOB.

Section 1: Your prescription drugs during the past month

You have 0 Prescription Drug EOBs for the Last Custom Days

The Medical EOB is a summary of the claims we get for your medical care in a particular month. For example, if we get claims in April, you’ll get a EOB in May. If there are no claims in May, you won’t get a EOB in June.

No results were found. Please select a different Date Range to search again. Only EOBs from the Last 18 months are searchable.
